channel.title: The music transition is really loud
channel.description:
It is loud, i know it's meant to be loud to make you nervous and tense, but it's wayyyy to loud, it hurts my ears. My volume was on 34 when i first heard it, it was all fine until i got to [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xtgzweYgZUo&feature=youtu.be']this spot (note - the volume was only on 26 suring this video due to the sound being too loud).[/url] It also happened a lot throught the game, it's not too much of a problem, but when people are shooting at me and i need to turn the sound down, and i'm on 15 health, i usually die.
Also, in the video, that song got louder as it progressed. It actually hurt. I had turned it down after it scared the shit out of me. But then the sound kept increasing. If my sound was on something like 60, jesus christ, i can't even imagine.
As i said, this isn't very important, but i'd just like t let you guys know.
Also, you really need to fix the AI. :wink:

item.title: The music transition is really loud
item.dc:creator: Sugna
item.description:
It is loud, i know it’s meant to be loud to make you nervous and tense, but it’s wayyyy to loud, it hurts my ears. My volume was on 34 when i first heard it, it was all fine until i got to this spot (note - the volume was only on 26 suring this video due to the sound being too loud). It also happened a lot throught the game, it’s not too much of a problem, but when people are shooting at me and i need to turn the sound down, and i’m on 15 health, i usually die.

Also, in the video, that song got louder as it progressed. It actually hurt. I had turned it down after it scared the shit out of me. But then the sound kept increasing. If my sound was on something like 60, jesus christ, i can’t even imagine.

As i said, this isn’t very important, but i’d just like t let you guys know.

Also, you really need to fix the AI.
